product_name: MUK LUKS Malena Boots - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: With button-up, bohemian style and cozy linings, the MUK LUKS Malena boots use cable-knit acrylic to keep your feet and legs warm when the temperatures drop. Cozy, cable-knit acrylic keeps you warm without being itchy or uncomfortable. Memory foam footbeds cushion feet. Thermoplastic rubber outsoles provide light traction indoors and out. Closeout.
short_description: With button-up, bohemian style and cozy linings, the MUK LUKS Malena boots use cable-knit acrylic to keep your feet and legs warm when the temperatures drop.
